PHRASE.LANG: Hikandles, or Hiking Sandals allow for protection and comfort, while still being light and open to allow for aeration. [#Legal]
Ces sandales de marche, légères et ouvertes pour une meilleure aération du pied, allient protection et confort.[#Legal]
Trekking-Sandalen bieten Schutz und Bequemlichkeit und sind dennoch leicht und atmungsaktiv.[#Legal]
Questi sandali da escursione proteggono i piedi lasciandoli respirare e rimanendo allo stesso tempo comodi e leggeri.[#Legal]
Sandalias de senderismo, ligeras y transpirables, para protegerte sin renunciar al confort.[#Legal]
ハイキング用のサンダル[#Legal]
발의 보호와 편안함을 동시에 제공하는 하이킹 샌들. 가볍고 통풍이 잘 되는 점은 플러스.[#Legal]
Hikandles, or Hiking Sandals allow for protection and comfort, while still being light and open to allow for aeration.[#Legal]
涼鞋考慮到保護性和舒適性，讓腳部又輕便又通風。[#Legal]
